spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained. However, the window in Bedroom 2 is incorrectly positioned on the side wall instead of the rear. Small orientation errors on interior door swings.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present. Major issue with the laundry/kitchen partition where a wall slab is floating/incorrectly merged. Wall thickness is consistent although some door embeddings create visual gaps.

furniture_mapping.notes: Generally accurate mapping of furniture to room purpose. Bedroom 2 includes a wardrobe not explicitly colored as a robe in the 2D plan, and the 'Linen' cupboard by the entry is rendered but structurally vague.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality rendering with consistent lighting and clay-style aesthetic. Orthographic/isometric projection is well-handled.

detected_errors.description: Window in Bedroom 2 is on the right-hand wall instead of the bottom wall as shown in the floor plan.
The door to the WC opens outwards/inward incorrectly compared to the plan swing arc.
Rendering artifact in the laundry/kitchen transition area where walls do not meet cleanly.
The balcony railing is simplified and does not match the solid/glass boundary indicated in the 2D sketch.
